DOC.brief_summary: SGLT-2 inhibitor belong new class hypoglycemic drug unique property decrease blood glucose increase glucosuria . These drug inhibit sodium glucose transporter 2 ( SGLT2 ) express luminal membrane proximal tubule . SGLT-2 inhibition type 2 diabetic subject healthy volunteer shift threshold renal glucose excretion low level . This effect independent insulin . The inhibition SGLT2 decrease HbA1C , systolic blood pressure weight diabetic subject . Recently , EMPA-REG trial demonstrate decrease cardiovascular mortality renal endpoint empagliflozin treat type 2 diabetic patient establish cardio-vascular disease . Because novel hypoglycemic drug unique direct effect renal tissue metabolism , important good examine effect kidney . With study , propose explore effect empagliflozin renal tissue oxygenation . Our hypothesis SGLT-2 inhibition decrease renal cortical energy requirement consequently increase renal tissue oxygenation .
DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled study examine acute chronic renal effect empagliflozin healthy volunteer . A total 45 healthy volunteer include study : 15 normal weight , 15 overweight ( BMI : 25-30kg/m2 ) 15 obese ( BMI > 30kg/m2 ) non diabetic subject ( determined oral glucose tolerance test ) . Empagliflozin 10mg v placebo administer blinded fashion qd . The acute chronic renal response empagliflozin assess .
DOC.criteria: Normal weight ( BMI : 1924.9kg/m2 ) , overweight ( BMI:2530kg/m2 ) obesity ( BMI > 30kg/m2 ) Men woman ( negative pregnancy test ) follicular phase menstrual cycle . All group balance number men woman . OGTT/HbA1C : normal prediabetes eGFR > 60ml/min , albumin/creatinine ratio < 3.3mg/mmol ( < 30 mg/g ) Signed consent form Normal renal ultrasound Normal urine dipstick Antihypertensive therapy NSAID treatment Former bariatric surgery Age < 18y > 50y At risk dehydration hypotension Past history recurrent genital urinary tract infection Contraindication MR imaging ( pacemaker implant metallic device , claustrophobia ) Pregnancy Sustained systolic blood pressure > 150mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 95mmHg
